game_description: SimplePlanes VR is a flight sim with an ever-expanding collection of aircraft to download and fly for free. Airplanes, helicopters, cars, boats, and more are available and new crafts are added every day. ● Crafts with fully immersive cockpits have virtual controls that you can reach out and grab with virtual hands. ● Download and fly crafts from SimplePlanes.com for free. Even if it does not have a fully immersive cockpit, you can still fly from the chase, orbit, and fly-by camera modes. ● Engage enemy aircraft with air-to-air missiles, such as the Guardian which is a highly maneuverable short-range missile, or fire and forget with the long-range Interceptor missile. ● Assault ground threats with an extensive arsenal of air-to-ground weapons and sink ships with torpedos. ● Multiple islands and airports to explore. ● Several racing courses and other challenges. Note: Just to be clear, you can't build aircraft in SPVR, but you can download and fly crafts from SimplePlanes.com.
review_1: I play hours and hours of simple planes on steam and when I’ve heard the announcement that they will have this game in VR I lost my marbles. As usual simple planes did not dissapoint in the VR version. Most Definitely my favorite vr flying game on the quest store. Simple planes is a bit cartoony in style but dont let that fool you from the immersive and vast creations they offer. Since I have the acual game I build my planes and test them out in the vr version wich I think is pretty amazing.
review_2: I love this game day in and day out although the only thing I wish is that if you could search for something but besides that it’s a great game and was worth buying
review_3: This game is so fun I have spent dozens of hours playing it, though I wish there was a bit more in the Sandbox game mode as there are not a whole lot of things on the ground to shoot at other than boats. Though being able to spawn enemy planes and such to shoot down does sort of make up for it. Still over all a well made and awesome game 10/10 Love all the little details you might not notice too, all the planes are super fun and simple to understand their functions, there is also a little clipboard that tells you how to start the plane if you’re new to the plane. For sure must have game.
review_4: If you are into aviation (especially military aviation), you have to get this game. By far the best flight simulator for the oculus quest. Infinite planes to choose from, a big map, extreme dogfights, and straightforward controls. I can spend countless hours playing this game because there is always something new to do, unlike other VR games. Best investment of $10 in my life.
review_5: It’s just great being able to fly use weapons and interact with stuff in game
